name: Ungaudly
description:
Ever wanted to play god? Now you can! 

As the new god on the job, create “unique” and "beautiful" new creatures to please your devoted worshipers. Be careful though! If your creatures don't match their vision,  you’ll be getting the boot from the big man.

How To Play:

  • Get an incomplete image of the creature from your worshipers!
  • Follow the hints from your follower's thoughts about the creature!
  • Try to spice it up by using the recommended under-used parts!
  • Bring the creature into the world and gain more Devotion!

Credits:

Logan Graham - Game design, programming

Jack Foster - Art

John Ray - Story and writing

Mike Farley - Art

Nikil Madhu - Sound design and music
